pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Null Model Algorithm to Analyze Cyclical Data in Ecology // Implements a null model analysis to quantify concurrent temporal niche overlap (i.e., activity or phenology) among biological identities (e.g., individuals, populations, species) using the Rosario randomization algorithm Castro-Arellano et al. (2010) doi:10.1111/j.2041-210X.2010.00031.x.
